top.title: Trump warns Iran 'time is running out' for nuclear deal as US military builds up in Gulf
top.summary: Tehran says its armed forces are ready "with their fingers on the trigger" to respond to any aggression.

top.title: 'Don't take us to a hospital': Iran protesters treated in secret to avoid arrest
top.summary: Wounded demonstrators tell the BBC they are relying on medics willing to risk their own safety by treating them at their homes.

top.title: Border agents involved in fatal shooting of Alex Pretti placed on leave
top.summary: As Trump and the Minneapolis Mayor spar over social media on immigration law enforcement, the US continues to be roiled by the killing of nurse Alex Pretti.

top.title: Driverless taxis set to launch in UK as soon as September
top.summary: Waymo has laid out plans for a robotaxi service in London with a pilot scheme due to begin in April.

top.title: Tesla sees first annual revenue drop as it shifts to AI and robots
top.summary: Multi-billionaire Elon Musk also announced plans to end production of its Model S and Model X vehicles.

top.title: Facebook-owner to nearly double AI spending this year
top.summary: Mark Zuckerberg's spending plans hint at further layoffs and changes within Facebook, Instagram and WhatsApp.

title.#text: Halide co-founder Sebastiaan de With is joining Apple’s design team
Mark Zuckerberg is all in on AI as the new social media
Windows 11 has reached 1 billion users faster than Windows 10
